TopicTitle: This is how I feel when I launch a rocket into space.

Articles.Content:
Sorry for the bump, on other forums I've been on people bump things practically right after.

(Edited after I saw the replies)

Edited April 11, 2014 by WindShieIds
You bumped after 10 minutes...? A bump is for when you for example have an important question that has slipped a few pages back. Not to get you back on the showed post on the forum home page!
Well there's 30 seconds ill never get back..

Er...bump.

Dude, it's not like we're here waiting all day for you to post a new thread.

"Oh, it's been nine minutes since I made that new useless thread and nobody has replied! Let's bump it!"

You remind me like me in my early days- coming to the forums from the MC forms, on MC you could easily get a response in a minute if it was really good, 10 minutes average. When I joined here, an hour or two is how long it took.
Now that we've all expressed our feelings about bumping, does anyone have anything to say about the topic of the thread?

Now that we've all expressed our feelings about bumping, does anyone have anything to say about the topic of the thread?

I can't comment on the video, I have no idea what's going on.

Well there's 30 seconds ill never get back..

This is what I think of it.
That video. You. I knew something was fishy when it wasn't embedded!
